about_the_game:
Symphorix is a top-down 2D bullet-hell, time-survival twin-stick shooter where every beat is your battleground. Step into the role of a newly awakened Core—an energy entity born from music itself—and fight through a rhythmic cosmos where enemies attack, adapt, and dance to the beat. Master combos, upgrade your Core, and unleash infinite, music-driven attacks in battles that change with EVERY SONG! Play to your own tracks, uncover hidden combos, or dive into hundreds of original songs featuring developer-crafted poetry. In Symphorix, the rhythm fuels the chaos, and survival demands mastery of the MUSIC!

  •  Rhythm-Based Combat: Every attack, enemy movement, and pulse syncs perfectly to the beat. The music isn’t just background—it’s your tactical guide and your greatest weapon.

  •  Dynamic Music Integration: Play to your own music or master over 500+ original tracks included in Symphorix, featuring developer-crafted poetry and a diverse range of genres. Whether it’s your favorite playlist, YouTube, or Spotify, every song is analyzed to generate unique combos, creating an ever-changing battlefield driven by sound.

  •  Enemies That Adapt to the Beat: Every song spawns unique enemies and bosses whose attack patterns are shaped by the rhythm. No two songs play the same, and no two battles are alike.

  •  Infinite Upgrades, Infinite Chaos: Customize your Core with an arsenal of upgradable attacks—from lasers to projectile storms to explosive particle sprays—all powered by the energy of beats and combos.

  •  Endless Replayability: Procedural environments, evolving enemy behaviors, and infinite upgrade combinations ensure every run feels fresh and unpredictable.

  •  Master the Music, Conquer the Challenge: Survive, adapt, and dominate leaderboards as you uncover hidden combos, challenge friends, and prove you’re the true master of each song.

  •  Energy Pulses & Combos: Harness the energy of the music to unleash hundreds of attack combinations—projectiles, homing missiles, flamethrower sprays, and explosive particle storms. Sync your attacks with the beat to maximize damage and efficiency, transforming rhythm into power.

  •  Customizable Combat Core: Configure your Core to match your playstyle. Equip exhaust nodes for lasers, missiles, and orbiting turrets, or deploy sturdy barriers and shields to hold the line. Upgrade endlessly to unleash a symphony of destruction, perfectly in tune with the music.

  •  Rhythm-Driven Dynamics: Every song shapes gameplay in real-time. A bass drop might trigger enemy volleys, teleportations, or sudden waves of reinforcements. Enemies move, attack, and adapt to the beat, ensuring every track delivers a unique and unpredictable challenge.

  •  Adaptive Enemy Systems: No two songs are the same—enemy behavior, attack patterns, and boss spawns are procedurally generated to match the rhythm of each track. Every beat creates a battlefield, and every song is a new fight for survival.

  •  Unleash Combos Hidden in the Music: Whether it’s your favorite playlist, YouTube tracks, or the game’s 500+ original songs with developer-written poetry, Symphorix uncovers unique combos and tactical opportunities in every beat.


  • Heart Crystal Upgrades: After every run, earn Heart Crystals to invest in abilities and enhancements that shape your strategy for the next challenge. But beware—the more you spend, the more you’ll need to survive to turn your investment into victory.

  • Visual and Auditory Spectacle: Symphorix is a feast for the senses. Stunning visuals, glowing particle effects, dynamic lighting, and a kaleidoscope of colors turn every beat into a breathtaking display. Coupled with immersive soundscapes and rhythm-driven gameplay, it’s a beautiful harmony of chaos and precision.

  • Roguelite Perfection: Each song is a brand-new battlefield, with infinite upgrades, procedurally generated challenges, and endless replayability. No two runs are the same, ensuring that every session feels fresh and exhilarating.

  • Global Leaderboards & Endless Mastery: Compete against players worldwide to prove you’re the master of your favorite tracks. Climb the ranks, perfect your rhythm, and leave your mark as the ultimate symphonic survivor.

ARE YOU READY TO SYNC WITH THE COSMOS AND MASTER THE RHYTHM OF SURVIVAL?
PLAY SYMPHORIX TODAY AND EXPERIENCE AN AUDIOVISUAL BULLET-HELL LIKE NO OTHER!
